name: FartyPants
0:
”Alexa, open Farty Pants”
”Alexa, ask Farty Pants to fire one out”
”Alexa, ask Farty Pants to do three farts”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: farty pants
des:
Ask Farty Pants to do a fart and hear a hilarious random fart sound. 

Will it be a big banger, or maybe a sneaky squealer.

Alexa will do the business, again and again. In fact, why not ask Farty Pants to do 3 farts to have lots of comedy fart noises fired out at once. 

Example phrases to get Farty Pants to let one rip are:

- ask Farty Pants to do a guffer
- ask Farty Pants to let one go
- ask Farty Pants to go 3 farts
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
